tool_description: Analyzes supplier's short-term liquidity position and ability to meet immediate financial obligations.
error_messages: Invalid financial amounts: All monetary values must be non-negative numbers.
Inconsistent data: Current assets should be greater than or equal to cash + inventory + accounts receivable.
Zero current liabilities: Current liabilities cannot be zero for meaningful liquidity analysis.
Extreme values detected: Financial amounts appear unusually high or low, please verify data accuracy.
usage: Provide current_assets, current_liabilities, and cash_equivalents. Optionally include inventory and accounts_receivable for more detailed analysis. Returns liquidity ratios and assessment.

current_ratio.description: Current assets divided by current liabilities

quick_ratio.description: Quick assets divided by current liabilities

cash_ratio.description: Cash and equivalents divided by current liabilities

liquidity_assessment.description: Overall liquidity assessment: EXCELLENT, GOOD, ADEQUATE, POOR, CRITICAL
